title: Summit seekers: the ascent of Sterling Peak, New Zealand
brief_description: Shows the mighty ranges of New Zealand’s Southern Alps, a tumultuous ocean of snows, present on all sides and the alpine pioneers who are courageous enough to climb these icy slopes. Mt Sterling is the highest peak.
title_for_label: Summit seekers: the ascent of Sterling Peak, New Zealand
description: Shows the mighty ranges of New Zealand’s Southern Alps, a tumultuous ocean of snows, present on all sides and the alpine pioneers who are courageous enough to climb these icy slopes. Mt Sterling is the highest peak.
